Our Approach

Business Model

Our core business combines strategic investments with consulting services and innovation utilization.

1. Investments

Strategic development of companies in collaboration with the German University of Digital Science

2. Consulting and Services

IT, Marketing, Sales, Personnel and Project Development

3. Innovation

Research to market transfer, Open source

4. Planned Vertical Shareholding

Professor and Research Center involvement structure

Financial Strategy

1

Investment Requirements

Initial phase: Build administrative infrastructure. Further development: Finance new investments and verticals.

2

Income Sources

Dividends from investments. Consulting fees. Government grants for innovation projects.

3

Risk Management

Diversified portfolio across technology sectors. Transparent reporting to investors.

Our Unique Approach

Vertical Participation Structure

Our vertical structure directly involves professors and research centers in newly founded verticals. This transforms university research into marketable digital products and business models.

  • Digital Management and New Work

Vertical Structure

Our unique structure allows for direct involvement of professors and research centers in newly founded verticals.

Our Digital Innovation Ecosystem

Connecting Academic Excellence with Entrepreneurial Practice

Purpose

As a catalyst, German UDS Innovation GmbH promotes sustainable technology transfer between science and industry and achieves attractive returns on investment. Our integrated ecosystem connects academic excellence with entrepreneurial practice.

Vision

Establish a successful investment company in digital innovations. Act as a catalyst for technology transfer between science and industry.

Investment Opportunities

Investor Value Proposition

Join us in shaping the digital future through strategic investments in innovation.

Digital University Investment

Access to an exclusive ecosystem combining academic innovation with entrepreneurial expertise.

CloudHouse Concept

Modern innovation hub promoting startups and serving as a platform for data management.

Acquisition Opportunities

Options to acquire or cooperate with promising startups emerging from the university environment.

Transparent Returns

Multiple income sources with regular updates and detailed KPI reporting.

Key Investment Opportunities

Company Shares

Financial participation in the development and success of the German UDS organization. This participation opens up the right to have a say in strategic decisions and active involvement.

Capital Investment

A capital contribution without acquiring shares offers the opportunity to support German UDS financially. This can take the form of an interest-free loan, a silent partnership or earmarked financing.

Joint Ventures

Establishment of subsidiaries, joint ventures or strategic partnerships. Targeted support for specific research or innovation projects.

Vertical Shareholding Structure

Investments in subsidiaries, associated companies or specialized project companies, creating flexibility for sponsors and companies that want to make a targeted commitment.

Our Investment Portfolio

Strategic Investments in the Digital Future

Our core business combines strategic investments with consulting services and innovation utilization.

German UDS Service GmbH

100% stake responsible for the IT infrastructure - both for the university and for external business partners.

FB Cloudhouse GmbH

20% stake in FB Cloudhouse GmbH handling administrative tasks and rental of space for the university and third parties.

German UDS gGmbH

20% participation in German UDS gGmbH (guarantee of creative involvement in the German University of Digital Science)
